name: Anissa and The Mimic
description:
Anissa and the Mimic is a 2D Action platformer. You play as Anissa, battling through environments with a Shield Mimic. 

Eliminate all of the enemies and push forward!

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • J to attack
  • K to block 
  • L to whip attack
  • Shift to run
